\begin{tikzpicture}
	[node distance=1.3cm,>=stealth',bend angle=45,auto]
	% set up the nodes
	\node (2) at (-2,2) {$\Hom{\CategoryC}{A}{A}$};
	\node (1) at (-2,-2) {$\Hom{\CategoryC}{A}{B}$};
	\node (3) at (2,2) {$FA$};
	\node (4) at (2,-2) {$FB$};

	\node (2') at (-3.5,3) {$\id{A}$};
	\node (1') at (-3.5,-3) {$f$};
	\node (3') at (3.5,3) {$x$};
	\node (4') at (2,-3) {$\tau_B(f)$};
	\node (eq) at (2.7,-3) {$=$};
	\node (5') at (3.5,-3) {$Ff(x)$};

	\draw[->] (2)--(1) node [midway,right] {$\Hom{\CategoryC}{A}{f}$};
	\draw[->] (2)--(3) node [midway,below] {$\tau_A$};
	\draw[->] (3)--(4) node [midway,left] {$Ff$};
	\draw[->] (1)--(4) node [midway,above] {$\tau_B$};

	\draw[red, |->] (2')--(1') node [midway,left] {};
	\draw[red, |->] (2')--(3') node [midway,above] {};
	\draw[red, |->] (3')--(5') node [midway,right] {};
	\draw[red, |->] (1')--(4') node [midway,below] {};
	%\draw[->] (2)--(4) node [midway,above right] {$h$};

	\begin{pgfonlayer}
		{background}
		\filldraw [line width=4mm,join=round,\backgrnd]
		([xshift=-3mm, yshift=1mm]2'.north -| 1'.west) rectangle ([xshift=0mm, yshift=-2mm]1'.south -| 5'.east);
	\end{pgfonlayer}

 \end{tikzpicture}
